author: A_Brickset_user
title: Catherine Cat in her Kitchen
review: The most lovely set from the Fabuland-series! All Catherine need to prepare a nice meal to her Fabuland-friends on her nice cooking-range. The cutest little refridgerator is included in this set and has a little box inside for the wegetables. The little wash-basin where Catherin wash her hands (or paws?) before eating is also very cute. To do the set more realistic, it comes with a number of food-decorated bricks. If you like Fabuland, this is a set-must-have;-)

author: bonz
title: very useful parts
review: this set contains a lot of nice parts (refridgerator, cooking pot, cups, table, stools, oven, sink,...) that were always hard-fought by me & my two sisters when we were creating our own houses with standard lego parts.
